ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to select two language at the same time in robots.txt Disallow languages field
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Go to /Admin/Setting/GeneralCommon URL 2) Select two language in Disallow languages field of robots.txt section and save it 3) After reload page you will find only one field is getting selected ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75615233/206734944-56cafdeb-8344-491b-a8fc-f44a7f87b6a7.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6436 Fixed possible problem with missing product image on home page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6456 Fixed problem with selecting two language at the same time in robots.txt Disallow languages field
